mapper.sql: id, status, createDate, lastModDate, code, name, type, unit, marketPrice, price, icon, action, intro, validValue
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_ali_product ( status, createDate, lastModDate, code, name, type, unit, marketPrice, price, icon, action, intro, validValue ) VALUES ( #{status}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{unit}, #{marketPrice}, #{price}, #{icon}, #{action}, #{intro}, #{validValue} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_ali_product
status = #{status},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
unit = #{unit},
marketPrice = #{marketPrice},
price = #{price},
icon = #{icon},
action = #{action},
intro = #{intro},
validValue = #{validValue},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_ali_product
status = #{map.status},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
code = #{map.code},
name = #{map.name},
type = #{map.type},
unit = #{map.unit},
marketPrice = #{map.marketPrice},
price = #{map.price},
icon = #{map.icon},
action = #{map.action},
intro = #{map.intro},
validValue = #{map.validValue},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_ali_product ( status, createDate, lastModDate, code, name, type, unit, marketPrice, price, icon, action, intro, validValue ) VALUES ( #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.code}, #{map.name}, #{map.type}, #{map.unit}, #{map.marketPrice}, #{map.price}, #{map.icon}, #{map.action}, #{map.intro}, #{map.validValue} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_ali_product
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{code} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND type like CONCAT('%', #{type} , '%')
AND unit like CONCAT('%', #{unit} , '%')
AND marketPrice like CONCAT('%', #{marketPrice} , '%')
AND price like CONCAT('%', #{price} , '%')
AND icon like CONCAT('%', #{icon} , '%')
AND action like CONCAT('%', #{action} , '%')
AND intro like CONCAT('%', #{intro} , '%')
AND validValue like CONCAT('%', #{validValue} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
